POPAlteration.description: Is an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for an order item.

applicationDuration.description: Duration during which the alteration applies on the order item price (for instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge)
The period for which the productOfferingPriceAlteration is applicable

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this order item price alteration

name.description: Name given to this price alteration

priceType.description: A category that describes the price such as recurring, one time and usage.

priority.description: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations on the order item price

validFor.description: The period for which this productOfferingPriceAlteration is valid

unitOfMeasure.description: A number and unit representing denominator of an alteration rate. For example, for a data discount rate of $1 per 20 GB usage, the amount of unitOfMeasure will be 20 with units as GB.
